description: It wasn't immediately obvious what to do after seleting the documents, but when I found the save button they were merged without issues. Good tool.
for concatination (haven't used other functions).
Haven't thoroughly testet it but it merges PDFs without problems.
segfault on debian stretch

Works fine and does the task however the UI doesn't have error catching so you may be wondering why prompts aren't appearing. The man page off their sourceforge project page describes how the program works. Without that you would be guessing on what inputs it needs.

I have been using a free online service to merge single pages of longer motions and pleadings into unified multi-page .pdf documents for electronic filing with the court, and I was concerned about getting things done on time because I don't have a reliable Internet connection. This tool takes one more worry off my plate about getting things done on time. I recreated a 19-page .pdf document that can be sent as one document and still have individual pages--exactly what I need! At present, I still have to create each page of a motion, etc., one page at a time, open each page in a browser and choose print to file (.pdf), and then put them all together as one motion, etc. I have tried more than ten different ways to get LibreOffice Writer to produce line-numbered pleading paper that will allow the text to line up with the numbers whenever it is double-spaced, etc., and the best that I can do is one page at a time. Thank you for making a horrible process a little easier by providing a product that simply does what it says it will do.
summary: Did Exactly What I Needed It To Do

description: I evaluate software for govts & educational organisations. PDF Chain has a poorly designed user interface & user experience. I have no idea how it works, what it does, or how to do things to PDFs with this app. I cannot recommend it to anyone.
I guess the 1 star reviews are from frustrated people, mostly. This works and it's easy to use.

Nice simple app. Loads without any hassle from the Ubuntu Software catalogue. The on-line help told me what I needed. I haven't explored all the features, but everything I've used for concatenating files seems to work so far.
I suppose if you dont know how to use computers this wouldnt make any sense, however I opened up my PDF and split it EZ.
I used to use PDF Mod. But that is no longer under development and doesn't work on ubuntu 20.04. I was looking for an alternative and found this one. It works fine. Highly recommed it.
This one worked when PDF Arranger wouldn't

description:
Es tan minimalista que aún no puedo creer que no haya 
podido ver el contenido de un pdf (quería solo leer).
En fin, supongo que abre pero no entiende ;-)
Il faut quelques instants pour comprendre comment utiliser l'interface, mais le logiciel fait parfaitement bien son travail (rotation, découpage, assemblage, etc)

Я просто хотела отделить пару страниц от моего пдф в 120 страниц. А пляски с бубном из-за этой вонючей программы я не хотела!!
